Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard/Hillborough Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillborough Way and Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard runs north and south, intersecting Hillborough Way, which runs east and west. Hillborough Way heads east towards the center of town, and through the numerous shops and stores located there. On the southeast corner of the intersection is the Great Fellowship Hall, and on the northeast is the Fairy Dust Inn. A small pub called the Groggy Thimble is located on the southwest corner, and the Shrine of Poseidon is on the northwest corner.
